<script>
    Ink.requireModules(['Ink.Util.Array_1','Ink.UI.Toggle_1'], function(InkArray, Toggle) {
        InkArray.each(Ink.ss('.toggle'),function(item){
            new Toggle(item);
        });
    });
</script>
